name: Dice Galaxies
description:
Dice Galaxies is a puzzle game in which the player controls a dice by rolling it around a level trying to reach a destination. In order to complete the level the player must overcome obstacles and other challenging limitations, all that depend on which side of the dice is facing up! 

Credits for assets used:

Dice: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/dice-d6-game-ready-pbr-2001...

Box Textures: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/futuristic-panel-tex...
